summary: A new player house in Morthal, capital of Hjaalmarch, next to Falion's house, as well as full Smithing tools next to the guardhouse.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Hello everybody! This small mod adds a house to Morthal. See the pictures!

The house is simple but cozy, with an alchemy table, a couple of small bookshelves, a weapon plaque, two weapon racks, and a mannequin. The statue in the corner is a fully functional shrine of Dibella. I did not include an enchanting table because I personally do not enchant much, but in case others may need it, I placed one in the local inn, in a corner away from prying eyes. And, just so you know, the fish barrel next to the door may respawn!

It is also fully navmeshed, although I am not an expert so if there's any problem with it, please tell me.

[u][b]Notes[/b][/u]
I originally made this mod for the Steam Workshop. Link [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=118492482]here[/url]. To install, place the files in your 'Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data' folder. Then activate the mod through your preferred launcher by ticking the checkbox next to the esp.


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
